tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_text TEXT,
    version_number INT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated_date TIMESTAMP,
    UNIQUE (contract_name)
);
CREATE TABLE contracts ( contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, contract_name VARCHAR(255), contract_text TEXT, version_number INT, created_at TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE agreements ( agreement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, agreement_name VARCHAR(255), agreement_text TEXT, version_number INT, created_at TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE versions ( version_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, document_id UUID, version_number INT, created_at TIMESTAMP )

CREATE TABLE Contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_title VARCHAR(255),
    contract_content TEXT,
    version_number INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE ContractVersions (
    version_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    version_number INT,
    version_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
    FOREIGN KEY(contract_id) REFERENCES Contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserPermissions (
    permission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    contract_id UUID,
    permissions VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(contract_id) REFERENCES Contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name STRING,
    contract_content STRING,
    version INT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Contractors (
    contractor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contractor_name STRING,
    address STRING,
    phone_number STRING,
    email STRING
)

CREATE TABLE ContractVersions (
    link_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    version_number INT,
    content STRING,
    created_by STRING,
    created_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ContractHistory (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    version_number INT,
    change_description STRING,
    changed_by STRING,
    change_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ContractStatus (
    status_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    version_number INT,
    status STRING,
    update_date TIMESTAMP
)
